com.team09.qanda.models

Class QuestionThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team09.qanda.models.QModel<QView>
      • com.team09.qanda.models.QuestionThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class QuestionThread
extends QModel<QView>
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to represent a thread consisting of a question and its answers, as well as all of their contained information.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuestionThread(Post question)
      A QuestionThread features a Question (a Post object) and any of its related answers (also a Post object), and replies

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuestionThread

        public QuestionThread(Post question)
        A QuestionThread features a Question (a Post object) and any of its related answers (also a Post object), and replies
        Parameters:
        question, - the main Post of the QuestionThread(ie. the question)

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the id of the QuestionThread. This id used to save QuestionThreads locally (via the Local Storage handler) and as an identifier for the Elastic Search Handler.
        Returns:
        a String representation of the QuestionThread's id

      • setId

        public void setId(java.lang.String id)
        Sets the id of the QuestionThread. This id used to save QuestionThreads locally (via the Local Storage handler) and as an identifier for the Elastic Search Handler.

      • getQuestion

        public Post getQuestion()
        Get the question (the main Post object) of this QuestionThread
        Returns:
        A Post object which represents the Question

      • getAnswers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Post> getAnswers()
        Get the answers to the question of the QuestionThread, if any
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Posts containing all the answers relating to this QuestionThreads' question

      • answerCount

        public int answerCount()
        Find the number answers that this QuestionThreads' question has. It uses the size() method of an ArrayList.Meaning, a call to this function is equivalent to calling getAnwers().size()
        Returns:
        an int representing the total number of answers

      • setAnswers

        public void setAnswers(java.util.ArrayList<Post> answers)
        Set the answers to the question of the QuestionThread. A call to this function will delete this QuestionThreads' answers. If previous answers need to be preserved, one should first make a call to getAnswers() and the answers to the corresponding ArrayList.

      • setQuestion

        public void setQuestion(Post question)
        Set the question (the main Post object) of this QuestionThread
